title: Cucumber and mint raita
description: A cool, fresh chutney that takes seconds to make. Use it to top fiery curries or as a dip for poppadoms.

default: ½ cucumber, grated or finely chopped
½-1 green chilli, de-seeded and finely chopped (optional)

steps: Wrap the grated cucumber in a tea towel and squeeze out any excess water.
Mix together all the ingredients and serve chilled as an accompaniment to any curry or as a dip for poppadoms.
